summary: Under threat by fundamentalist terrorists, a group of Trappist monks stationed with an impoverished Algerian community must decide whether to leave or stay.
cast: Lambert Wilson|Michael Lonsdale|Olivier Rabourdin|Philippe Laudenbach|Jacques Herlin|Lo誰c Pichon|Xavier Maly|Jean-Marie Frin|Abdelhafid Metalsi|Sabrina Ouazani|Abdellah Moundy|Olivier Perrier|Farid Larbi|Adel Bencherif|Bena誰ssa Ahaouari|Idriss Karimi|Abdellah Chakiri|Goran Kostic|Stanislas Stanic|Arben Bajraktaraj|Zhour Laamri|Raouia|Farid Bouslam|Fadia Assal|Maria Bouslam|Souka誰na Bouslam|Rabii Ben Johail|Sa誰d Naciri|Hamid Aboutaieb|El Alaoui El Hassan
title: De dioses y hombres
